Name: Ridiculousness
Title: Sterling and Carly Aquilino LXXV
Desc: Tossing things to kids who are too young to dodge; tow damage; go super American.
LongDescription: Rob, Steelo, and Carly Aquilino toss things to kids who are too young to dodge; wish they'd parked somewhere else in tow damage; go super American in U.S. on full display.
